con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="MessageBoardImplService" targetNamespace="http://resource.fpi.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://resource.fpi.com/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://resource.fpi.com/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="Message" type="tns:messageBean"/> <xs:element name="clear" type="tns:clear"/> <xs:element name="clearResponse" type="tns:clearResponse"/> <xs:element name="createMessage" type="tns:createMessage"/> <xs:element name="createMessageResponse" type="tns:createMessageResponse"/> <xs:element name="getMessage" type="tns:getMessage"/> <xs:element name="getMessageResponse" type="tns:getMessageResponse"/> <xs:element name="listMessages" type="tns:listMessages"/> <xs:element name="listMessagesResponse" type="tns:listMessagesResponse"/> <xs:element name="listMessagesV2" type="tns:listMessagesV2"/> <xs:element name="listMessagesV2Response" type="tns:listMessagesV2Response"/> <xs:element name="removeMessage" type="tns:removeMessage"/> <xs:element name="removeMessageResponse" type="tns:removeMessageResponse"/> <xs:element name="update" type="tns:update"/> <xs:element name="updateResponse" type="tns:updateResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="getMessage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="messageId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getMessageResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="messageBean"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="content" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sender" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="url" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="exceptionDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="faultMessage" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="update"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="updateResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="return" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createMessage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createMessageResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listMessagesV2"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listMessagesV2Response"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listMessages"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listMessagesResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="removeMessage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="messageId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="removeMessageResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:messageBean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="clear"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="clearResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ServiceException" type="tns:ServiceException"/> <xs:complexType name="ServiceException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="faultDetails" type="tns:exceptionDetails"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getMessageResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getMessageResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="update"> <wsdl:part element="tns:update" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMessagesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMessagesResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getMessage" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="removeMessageResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:removeMessageResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createMessageResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createMessageResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="clearResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:clearResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMessagesV2"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMessagesV2" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMessagesV2Response"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMessagesV2Response" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createMessage" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ServiceException"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ServiceException" name="ServiceException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="removeMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:removeMessage" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MessageBoard"> <wsdl:operation name="getMessage"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getMessage" name="getMessage"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getMessageResponse" name="getMessageResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ServiceException" name="ServiceException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="update"> <wsdl:input message="tns:update" name="update"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:updateResponse" name="updateResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ServiceException" name="ServiceException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createMessage"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createMessage" name="createMessage"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:createMessageResponse" name="createMessageResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ServiceException" name="ServiceException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMessagesV2"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listMessagesV2" name="listMessagesV2"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listMessagesV2Response" name="listMessagesV2Response"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMessages"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listMessages" name="listMessages"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listMessagesResponse" name="listMessagesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="removeMessage"> <wsdl:input message="tns:removeMessage" name="removeMessage"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:removeMessageResponse" name="removeMessageResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ServiceException" name="ServiceException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="clear"> <wsdl:input message="tns:clear" name="clear"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:clearResponse" name="clearResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MessageBoardImplServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:MessageBoard"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getMessage"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getMessage"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getMessageResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ServiceException"> <soap:fault name="ServiceException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createMessage"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createMessage"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createMessageResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ServiceException"> <soap:fault name="ServiceException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="update"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="update"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="updateResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ServiceException"> <soap:fault name="ServiceException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMessagesV2"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="listMessagesV2"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listMessagesV2Response"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMessages"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="listMessages"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listMessagesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="clear"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="clear"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="clearResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="removeMessage"> con:request.name: createMessage - sender to long
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:res="http://resource.fpi.com/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <res:createMessage> <!--Optional:--> <message> <!--Optional:--> <content>test</content> <!--Optional:--> <sender>test test test testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest testtest test</sender> <!--Optional:--> <title>test</title> <!--Optional:--> <url>http://www.google.com</url> </message> </res:createMessage> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Copy of Property Transfer of message id

con:request.name: update - Request 1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:res="http://resource.fpi.com/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <res:update> <message> <id>11</id> <title>test title updated</title> <content>test content updated</content> <sender>test sender updated</sender> <url>http://www.yahoo.com</url> </message> </res:update> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Copy of Copy of Property Transfer of message id

con:configuration.content: <return xmlns:ns2="http://resource.fpi.com/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <id>*</id> <title>test title updated</title> <content>test content updated</content> <sender>test sender updated</sender> <url>http://www.yahoo.com</url> </return>

con:testStep.name: Copy of Property Transfer of message id
